name: Magic Sands
description:
You awaken stranded in a desert. A stranger offers you water or a diamond. What will you risk to earn the most treasure? Escape the desert before you dehydrate and keep your riches.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

There are 3 download options

1) .Jar for Windows: You will need java installed on your PC to run this.

2) .exe for Windows: Compatible with both 32 and 64 bit systems.

3) APK for Android: You will need to adjust security settings to install. An official Google Play app is coming soon.
